    • Field Detail

      • scheme

        @JsonPropertyDescription(value="An classification should be drawn from an existing scheme or list of codes. This field is used to indicate the scheme/codelist from which the classification is drawn. For line item classifications, this value should represent an known [Item Classification Scheme](http://standard.open-contracting.org/latest/en/schema/codelists/#item-classification-scheme) wherever possible.")
private java.lang.String scheme
        Scheme

        An classification should be drawn from an existing scheme or list of codes. This field is used to indicate the scheme/codelist from which the classification is drawn. For line item classifications, this value should represent an known [Item Classification Scheme](http://standard.open-contracting .org/latest/en/schema/codelists/#item-classification-scheme) wherever possible.

      • id

        @JsonPropertyDescription(value="The classification code drawn from the selected scheme.")
private java.lang.String id
        ID

        The classification code drawn from the selected scheme.

      • description

        @JsonPropertyDescription(value="A textual description or title for the code.")
private java.lang.String description
        Description

        A textual description or title for the code.

      • uri

        @JsonPropertyDescription(value="A URI to identify the code. In the event individual URIs are not available for items in the identifier scheme this value should be left blank.")
private java.net.URI uri
        URI

        A URI to identify the code. In the event individual URIs are not available for items in the identifier scheme this value should be left blank.

    • Method Detail

      • getScheme

        public java.lang.String getScheme()
        Scheme

        An classification should be drawn from an existing scheme or list of codes. This field is used to indicate the scheme/codelist from which the classification is drawn. For line item classifications, this value should represent an known [Item Classification Scheme](http://standard.open-contracting .org/latest/en/schema/codelists/#item-classification-scheme) wherever possible.

      • setScheme

        public void setScheme(java.lang.String scheme)
        Scheme

        An classification should be drawn from an existing scheme or list of codes. This field is used to indicate the scheme/codelist from which the classification is drawn. For line item classifications, this value should represent an known [Item Classification Scheme](http://standard.open-contracting .org/latest/en/schema/codelists/#item-classification-scheme) wherever possible.
